verses.t: Now{G1161} in{G1722} the fifteenth{G4003} year{G2094} of the reign{G3588} of Tiberius{G5086} Cæsar{G2541}, Pontius{G4194} Pilate{G4091} being governor{G2230} of Judæa{G3588}, and{G2532} Herod{G2264} being tetrarch{G5075} of Galilee{G3588}, and{G1161} his{G846} brother{G3588} Philip{G5376} tetrarch{G5075} of Ituraea{G2484} and{G2532} of the region{G5561} of Trachonitis{G5139}, and{G2532} Lysanias{G3078} the tetrarch{G5075} of Abilene{G3588},

Annas{G452} and{G2532} Caiaphas{G2533} being{G1909} the high priests{G749}, the word{G4487} of God{G2316} came{G1096} unto{G1909} John{G2491} the son{G5207} of Zacharias{G3588} in{G1722} the wilderness{G2048}.
And{G2532} he came{G2064} into{G1519} all{G3956} the country about{G4066} Jordan{G3588}, preaching{G2784} the baptism{G908} of repentance{G3341} for{G1519} the remission{G859} of sins{G266};

As{G5613} it is written{G1125} in{G1722} the book{G976} of the words{G3056} of Esaias{G2268} the prophet{G3588}, saying{G3004}, The voice{G5456} of one crying{G994} in{G1722} the wilderness{G2048}, Prepare ye{G2090} the way{G3588} of the Lord{G2962}, make{G4160} his{G846} paths{G3588} straight{G2117}.

Every{G3956} valley{G5327} shall be filled{G4137}, and{G2532} every{G3956} mountain{G3735} and{G2532} hill{G1015} shall be brought low{G5013}; and{G2532} the crooked{G4646} shall be made{G2071} straight{G2117}, and{G2532} the rough{G5138} ways{G3598} shall be made{G1519} smooth{G3006};
And{G2532} all{G3956} flesh{G4561} shall see{G3700} the salvation{G4992} of God{G3588}.

Then{G3767} said he{G3004} to the multitude{G3793} that came forth{G1607} to be baptized{G907} of{G5259} him{G846}, O generation{G1081} of vipers{G2191}, who{G5101} hath warned{G5263} you{G5213} to flee{G5343} from{G575} the wrath{G3709} to come{G3195}?

Bring forth{G4160} therefore{G3767} fruits{G2590} worthy{G514} of repentance{G3588}, and{G2532} begin{G756} not{G3361} to say{G3004} within{G1722} yourselves{G1438}, We have{G2192} Abraham{G11} to{G3962} our father{G3962}: for{G1063} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, That{G3754} God{G3588} is able{G1410} of{G1537} these{G5130} stones{G3588} to raise up{G1453} children{G5043} unto Abraham{G11}.

And{G1161} now{G2235} also{G2532} the axe{G3588} is laid{G2749} unto{G4314} the root{G3588} of the trees{G3588}: every{G3956} tree{G1186} therefore{G3767} which bringeth{G4160} not{G3361} forth{G4160} good{G2570} fruit{G2590} is hewn down{G1581}, and{G2532} cast{G906} into{G1519} the fire{G4442}.
And{G2532} the people{G3588} asked{G1905} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, What{G5101} shall we do{G4160} then{G3767}?

He answereth{G611} and{G1161} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, He that hath{G2192} two{G1417} coats{G5509}, let him impart{G3330} to him that hath{G2192} none{G3361}; and{G2532} he that hath{G2192} meat{G1033}, let him do{G4160} likewise{G3668}.
Then{G1161} came{G2064} also{G2532} publicans{G5057} to be baptized{G907}, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Master{G1320}, what{G5101} shall we do{G4160}?
And{G1161} he said{G2036} unto{G4314} them{G846}, Exact{G4238} no{G3367} more{G4119} than{G3844} that which is appointed{G1299} you{G5213}.

And{G1161} the soldiers{G4754} likewise{G2532} demanded{G1905} of him{G846}, saying{G3004}, And{G2532} what{G5101} shall{G4160} we{G2249} do{G4160}? And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto{G4314} them{G846}, Do violence to{G1286} no man{G3367}, neither{G3366} accuse{G4811} any falsely{G4811}; and{G2532} be content{G714} with{G3588} your{G5216} wages{G3800}.

And{G1161} as the people{G3588} were in expectation{G4328}, and{G2532} all men{G3956} mused{G1260} in{G1722} their{G846} hearts{G3588} of{G4012} John{G3588}, whether{G3379} he{G846} were{G1498} the Christ{G3588}, or not{G3379};

John{G3588} answered{G611}, saying{G3004} unto{G537} them all{G537}, I{G1473} indeed{G3303} baptize{G907} you{G5209} with water{G5204}; but{G1161} one mightier than{G2478} I{G3450} cometh{G2064}, the latchet{G3588} of whose{G3739} shoes{G3588} I am{G1510} not{G3756} worthy{G2425} to unloose{G3089}: he{G846} shall baptize{G907} you{G5209} with{G1722} the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} and{G2532} with fire{G4442}:

Whose{G3739} fan{G3588} is in{G1722} his{G846} hand{G3588}, and{G2532} he will throughly purge{G1245} his{G846} floor{G3588}, and{G2532} will gather{G4863} the wheat{G3588} into{G1519} his{G846} garner{G3588}; but{G1161} the chaff{G892} he will burn{G2618} with fire{G4442} unquenchable{G762}.
And{G2532} many{G4183} other things{G2087} in his exhortation{G3870} preached he{G2097} unto the people{G3588}.seemed simplest to ignore men ouv; should polla be many + things? can go either way

But{G1161} Herod{G2264} the tetrarch{G3588}, being reproved{G1651} by{G5259} him{G846}for{G4012} Herodias{G2266} his{G846} brother{G3588} Philip's{G5376} wife{G3588}, and{G2532} for{G4012} all{G3956} the evils{G4190} which{G3739} Herod{G3588} had done{G4160},
Added{G4369} yet{G2532} this{G5124} above{G1909} all{G3956}, that{G2532} he shut up{G2623} John{G3588} in{G1722} prison{G3588}.

Now{G1161} when{G1722} all{G537} the people{G3588} were baptized{G907}, it came to pass{G1096}, that Jesus{G2424} also{G2532} being baptized{G907}, and{G2532} praying{G4336}, the heaven{G3588} was opened{G455},

And{G2532} the{G3588} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} descended{G2597} in a bodily{G4984} shape{G1491} like{G5616} a dove{G4058} upon{G1909} him{G846}, and{G2532} a voice{G5456} came{G1096} from{G1537} heaven{G3772}, which said{G3004}, Thou{G4771} art{G1488} my{G3450} beloved{G27} Son{G3588}; in{G1722} thee{G4671} I am well pleased{G2106}.

And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} himself{G846} began{G756} to be{G2258} about{G5616} thirty{G5144} years of age{G2094}, being{G5607} (as{G5613} was supposed{G3543}) the son{G5207} of Joseph{G2501}, which was{G2242} the son of Heli{G2242},
